entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 12:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: NW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
